trans-unit.target: 表示一个正则表达式对象。

trans-unit.source: This class belongs to the built-in object model category.
trans-unit.target: 此类属于内置对象模型类别。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether searches are performed with the global flag (<c>/g</c>), matching all occurrences.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指示是否使用匹配所有匹配项的全局标志 (<c>/g</c>) 来执行搜索。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if global searches are performed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行全局搜索，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether searches are performed with the case-insensitive flag (<c>/i</c>).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指示是否用不区分大小写标志 (<c>/i</c>) 来执行搜索。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if case-insensitive searches are performed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行不区分大小写的搜索，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the last successful match.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最后一个成功匹配的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the last successful match, if there was one.
trans-unit.target: 最后一个成功匹配（如果有）的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether searches are performed with the multiline flag (<c>/m</c>).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指示是否用多行标志 (<c>/m</c>) 来执行搜索。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if searches are performed in multiline mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在多行模式下执行搜索，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the regular expression pattern that is represented by this object.
trans-unit.target: 获取由此对象表示的正则表达式模式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern that is represented by this object.
trans-unit.target: 由此对象表示的正则表达式模式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this object that contains the regular expression pattern and flags.
trans-unit.target: 创建此对象的字符串表示形式，其中包含正则表达式模式和标志。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: 此对象的字符串表示形式。
